XPontus XML Editor features - XSLT Scenarios

section.title: Overview
section.p: We can define XSLT scenarios as XSLT transformations. The user defines the following data :

ul.li: an XSLT stylesheet which will be used to transform the XML file and optionnaly some parameters
the type of result expected (svg, html, pdf, text, xml)
the output file to store the result

section.title: Adding an XSLT Scenario
section.p: You can add/edit/remove a XSLT scenario by using the menu Tools->Manage XSLT scenarios

section.title: Execute an XSLT scenario
section.p: You can perform a XSLT scenario by using the menu Tools->Execute XML scenario XML
